## action.ShouldAct type

Return type for [action.Action.shouldAct()](./cloud.action.action.shouldact.md) that describes whether an action should be taken and why.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ShouldAct = false | ShouldActDetail;
```
